The Thing About Jellyfish.author: Ali Benjamin
The Thing About Jellyfish.cat_pun: This book whiskered me away to a sea of emotions.
The Thing About Jellyfish.sea_turtle_pun: A shellebration of life, love, and loss!

Honey and Spice.author: Bolu Babalola
Honey and Spice.cat_pun: A pawsitively charming tale with a sweet twist!
Honey and Spice.sea_turtle_pun: This book is fin-tastic and full of flavor!

The Poppy War.author: R. F. Kuang
The Poppy War.cat_pun: A claw-some mix of strategy and magic.
The Poppy War.sea_turtle_pun: A tide-turning tale of power and survival.

1984.author: George Orwell
1984.cat_pun: Fur-midable and thought-provoking, this is the purrfect dystopia.
1984.sea_turtle_pun: A deep dive into the currents of surveillance and control.

The Book Thief.author: Markus Zusak
The Book Thief.cat_pun: A purr-spective on the power of words and resilience.
The Book Thief.sea_turtle_pun: A timeless story that swims deep into the human spirit.

The Kite Runner.author: Khaled Hosseini
The Kite Runner.cat_pun: A meow-sterpiece of love and redemption.
The Kite Runner.sea_turtle_pun: A ripple-effect story of loyalty and forgiveness.

Circe.author: Madeline Miller
Circe.cat_pun: A purr-suasive retelling of a classic myth.
Circe.sea_turtle_pun: A wave-making journey of transformation and magic.

The Nightingale.author: Kristin Hannah
The Nightingale.cat_pun: This tale of bravery is purr-fection, with characters who fight like fierce felines.
The Nightingale.sea_turtle_pun: A story of resilience that will have you swimming through tears and shell-bration.

Six of Crows.author: Leigh Bardugo
Six of Crows.cat_pun: These cunning characters are claw-ver, sleek, and paws-itively thrilling!
Six of Crows.sea_turtle_pun: This gang of misfits is turtle-y unstoppable—like a heist in the deep blue sea!

War and Peace.author: Leo Tolstoy
War and Peace.cat_pun: This book is a paw-some marathon, filled with characters that pounce off the page.
War and Peace.sea_turtle_pun: This epic tale is slow and steady, just like a sea turtle’s journey—worth every page.
